# baseWritingDirection

**Instance Property**

The base writing direction for the paragraph.

## Declaration

```swift
var baseWritingDirection: NSWritingDirection { get }
```

## Discussion

If you the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWritingDirection/natural], the receiver resolves the writing direction to either [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWritingDirection/leftToRight] or [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWritingDirection/rightToLeft], depending on the direction for the user’s language preference setting.

## Determining writing direction

- **defaultWritingDirection(forLanguage:)**: Returns the default writing direction for the specified language.
- **NSWritingDirection**: Constants that specify the writing direction.
